newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spanish futures contract Bonds above 110 after Cpi.
newsitem.headline: Spanish futures contract Bonds above 110 after Cpi.

text.p: Spanish Bond market rose to new record high after a lower-than expected October Cpi number, dealers said.
The October Cpi rose to 0.1 percent month-on-month after a 0.2 percent rise in September, and 3.5 pct year-on-year after a 3.6 pct rise one month ago. Forecasts were at 0.2 and 3.6.
The December 10-year contract rose above the psycological level of 110, while the cash spread over the German Bunds delined steadily to 150 basis points.
